content.text:
# 2022 President's Cup – Men's singles

Roman Safiullin
| runner   =  Denis Yevseyev
| score    = 2–6, 6–4, 7–6(7–2)
| edition  =
| before_name  = President's Cup II – Singles
}}
Andrey Kuznetsov was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title.
Roman Safiullin won the title after defeating Denis Yevseyev 2–6, 6–4, 7–6(7–2) in the final.
Seeds
Roman Safiullin (champion)
#  Jay Clarke (first round, retired)
#  Dmitry Popko (semifinals)
#  Mikhail Kukushkin (second round)
#  Timofey Skatov (first round)
#  Evgeny Karlovskiy (second round)
#  Evgeny Donskoy (quarterfinals)
#  Illya Marchenko (first round)
}}
